Title: Perlin noise Version: 1.3 Author: Ron Valstar Author URI: http://www.sjeiti.com/ Original code port from http://mrl.nyu.edu/~perlin/noise/ and some help from http://freespace.virgin.net/hugo.elias/models/m_perlin.htm AS3 optimizations by Mario Klingemann http://www.quasimondo.com Haxe port and optimization by Nicolas Cannasse http://haxe.org Cross-platform and simplified by Richard Janicek http://janicek.co
